channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bins filled with building stuff., 3rd November
item.description:
Three bins full of flooring. One bin needs removing (without lid) …the other two have not been returned to their respective properties by the occupants . The pavement area is obstructed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alberta Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three dangerous flying tipping incidents within a couple of metres of one another, 3rd November
item.description:
Please come and remove the abandoned fridge, mattress and the mess dumped by folks at the Old Kent Road end of Cobourg Road. The fridge in particular is dangerous - lots of children play in this area beside the park. This is urgent. Thank you for your help.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cobourg Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
